member.name: IOleInPlaceFrame.EnableModeless
member.summary: Enables or disables a frame's modeless dialog boxes.
member.param: Specifies whether the modeless dialog box windows are to be enabled (TRUE) or disabled (FALSE).
member.returns: This method returns S_OK if the dialog box was either enabled or disabled successfully, depending on the value for fEnable.

member.name: IOleInPlaceFrame.InsertMenus
member.summary: Enables the container to insert menu groups into the composite menu to be used during the in-place session.
member.param: A handle to an empty menu.
A pointer to an array with six elements. The container fills in elements 0, 2, and 4 to reflect the number of menu elements it provided in the File, View, and Window menu groups.

returns.para: This method returns S_OK on success. Other possible return values include the following.

member.name: IOleInPlaceFrame.RemoveMenus
member.summary: Removes a container's menu elements from the composite menu.
member.param: A handle to the in-place composite menu that was constructed by calls to and the function.

returns.para: This method returns S_OK on success. Other possible return values include the following.

member.name: IOleInPlaceFrame.SetMenu
member.summary: Adds a composite menu to the window frame containing the object being activated in place.
member.param: A handle to the composite menu constructed by calls to and the function.
A handle to the menu descriptor returned by the function.
A handle to a window owned by the object and to which menu messages, commands, and accelerators are to be sent.

returns.para: This method returns S_OK on success. Other possible return values include the following.

member.name: IOleInPlaceFrame.SetStatusText
member.summary: Sets and displays status text about the in-place object in the container's frame window status line.

returns.para: This method returns S_OK on success. Other possible return values include the following.

listheader.description: Some text was displayed but the message was too long and was truncated.

member.name: IOleInPlaceFrame.TranslateAccelerator
member.summary: Translates accelerator keystrokes intended for the container's frame while an object is active in place.
member.param: A pointer to the structure that contains the keystroke message.
The command identifier value corresponding to the keystroke in the container-provided accelerator table. Containers should use this value instead of translating again.

returns.para: This method returns S_OK on success. Other possible return values include the following.

member.name: IOleInPlaceFrame
member.summary: Controls the container's top-level frame window. This control involves allowing the container to insert its menu group into the composite menu, install the composite menu into the appropriate window frame, and remove the container's menu elements from the composite menu. It sets and displays status text relevant to the in-place object. It also enables or disables the frame's modeless dialog boxes, and translates accelerator keystrokes intended for the container's frame.
